ygData.subject: Re: Heeeeeeeeeeeelp!  :) :) :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Whatcha been doin , brother? You ve missed out on what is commonly seen as one of the best starting zones in Norrath, our very own Butcherblock Mountains!
ygData.messageBody:
Whatcha been doin', brother? You've missed out on
what is commonly seen as one of the best starting
zones in Norrath, our very own Butcherblock Mountains!
There are at least four quests I can think of off the
top of my head that a fine young Pally like you could
do quite easily. Come home!<br><br>Bone Chips --
talk to Gunlok Jure in your very own guild; turn in
bone chips in sets of four for exp and an
item<br><br>Aviak Chick Talons -- go through the door behind
Gunlok, and give four Aviak Chick talons (they drop off
of Krag Chicks) to Bumle Reminjar for exp and an
item<br><br>Rat Patrol -- Jeet, one of my guild masters who
stands next to the bank in Kaladim, will give you exp
and an item for every four Rat Pelts you turn in. The
Giant Rats spawn in the mine, on the bridge; if you're
lucky, you'll get the Cleaner VII, which drops metal
pieces that you can also turn in to Jeet if your faction
is high enough. Unfortunately, you get a Rogue-only
no-drop item.<br><br>While you're in the mines, talk to
Diggins of the Rogues' guild: Diggins says he'll "maybe
just maybe" give you a Piercing weapon for 4 Runnyeye
Warbeads - I think they still drop off of Goblins in
Butcherblock, even though they're now Goblins of a different
clan. <br><br>I've never done this one, but Allakhazam
says:<br>"Bring Nultal Malfoot in the cleric guild 4 skunk scent
glands for some experience, money, faction and usually a
cleric spell. The faction hits for this quest are:
+ClericsofUnderfoot, +KazonStormhammer, +MinersGuild249."<br><br>And
this is just in Kaladim North, and just a few that
looked appropriate for your level (if not class). Go
here for a full list of quests by zone (and send
Allakhazam some money using PayPal, if you can, it's a great
site):<br><br><a href=http://eqdb.allakhazam.com/zlist.html target=new>http://eqdb.allakhazam.com/zlist.html</a><br><br>Or, if you're on the Drinal server, send me a tell
sometime and I'll show you around. <br><br>Kharlisht of
Kaladim<br>15th season rogue<br>Drinal<br>Specializing in
backstabbing, corpse recovery, and Butcherblock Mountains guide
service
